mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Gym ( gymNo, gymMasterCk, gymEmail, gymPwd, gymName, gymPhone, gymZipcode, gymAddress1, gymAddress2, gymAddress3, gymRegiimgname, gymReginumber, gymTitle, gymContents, gymMarketing, Status, approvedAdmID ) VALUES ( #{gymNo}, #{gymMasterCk}, #{gymEmail}, #{gymPwd}, #{gymName}, #{gymPhone}, #{gymZipcode}, #{gymAddress1}, #{gymAddress2}, #{gymAddress3}, #{gymRegiimgname}, #{gymReginumber}, #{gymTitle}, #{gymContents}, #{gymMarketing}, #{Status}, #{approvedAdmID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Gym SET gymMasterCk = #{gymMasterCk}, gymEmail = #{gymEmail}, gymPwd = #{gymPwd}, gymName = #{gymName}, gymPhone = #{gymPhone}, gymZipcode = #{gymZipcode}, gymAddress1 = #{gymAddress1}, gymAddress2 = #{gymAddress2}, gymAddress3 = #{gymAddress3}, gymRegiimgname = #{gymRegiimgname}, gymReginumber = #{gymReginumber}, gymTitle = #{gymTitle}, gymContents = #{gymContents}, gymMarketing = #{gymMarketing}, Status = #{Status}, approvedAdmID = #{approvedAdmID} WHERE gymNo = #{gymNo}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT g.gymNo, g.gymName, g.gymPhone, g.gymAddress1, g.gymAddress2, g.gymAddress3, g.gymTitle, gi.gymImgname, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY g.gymNo ORDER BY gi.gymImgNo) AS rank FROM Gym g JOIN GymImg gi ON g.gymNo = gi.gymNo WHERE gi.gymImgdetailCk = '0' AND g.typeNo = #{typeNo} ) t WHERE t.rank = 1

SELECT g.gymNo,g.gymName, g.gymPhone, g.gymZipcode, g.gymAddress1, g.gymAddress2, g.gymAddress3, g.gymTitle, g.gymContents, g.gymMarketing
FROM Gym g JOIN Gymtype gt ON g.gymNo = gt.gymNo WHERE gt.typeNo = 1
SELECT gymNo,gymImgname, gymImgdetailCk FROM GymImg WHERE gymNo = #{gymNo} AND gymMasterCk = '1'

select t.*, likeCount.likecount from ( select g.gymNo, g.gymName, g.gymPhone, g.gymAddress1, g.gymAddress2, g.gymAddress3, g.gymTitle, gi.gymImgname, rank() over (partition by g.gymNo order by gi.gymImgNo) as rank from Gym g join GymImg gi on g.gymNo = gi.gymNo where gi.gymImgdetailCk = '0' ) t left join ( select t.gymNo, count(l.likeNo) as likecount from Like1 l join ticket t on t.ticketNo = l.ticketNo group by t.gymNo ) likeCount on likeCount.gymNo = t.gymNo where t.rank = 1

SELECT G.gymNo, G.gymName, G.gymAddress3, G.gymTitle, G.gymMarketing, G.Status, MIN(GI.gymImgname) AS gymImgname, T.ticketPrice AS minTicketPrice FROM Gym G INNER JOIN gymImg GI ON G.gymNo = GI.gymNo INNER JOIN ( SELECT gymNo, ticketPrice, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY gymNo ORDER BY ticketPrice) AS priceRank FROM ticket ) T ON G.gymNo = T.gymNo WHERE G.gymMarketing = '1' AND T.priceRank = 1 AND GI.gymImgdetailCk = 0 GROUP BY G.gymNo, G.gymName, G.gymAddress3, G.gymTitle, G.gymMarketing, G.Status, T.ticketPrice

SELECT gymNo, gymName, ticketPrice, ticketNo, ticketName, ticketDiscount, gymImgName FROM ( SELECT G.gymNo, G.gymName, T.ticketPrice, T.ticketNo, T.ticketName, T.ticketDiscount, GI.gymImgname AS gymImgName, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY G.gymNo ORDER BY T.ticketDiscount DESC) AS rn FROM Gym G INNER JOIN gymImg GI ON G.gymNo = GI.gymNo AND GI.gymImgdetailCk = 0 INNER JOIN ( SELECT gymNo, ticketPrice, ticketNo, ticketName, ticketDiscount FROM Ticket WHERE ticketDiscount > 0 ) T ON G.gymNo = T.gymNo ) Subquery WHERE rn = 1
